Subject: [ANN] Heritrix releases 1.14.1, 2.0.1 now available
X-Yahoo-Group-Post: member; u=137285340; y=n06CNmD3RL1p4MsCALfmsRCwoVOEB9vx1-XuROcWh_u1
X-Yahoo-Profile: gojomo

Heritrix releases 1.14.1 and 2.0.1 are now available at Sourceforge:

http://sourceforge.net/project/showfiles.php?group_id=73833

These are both primarily bugfix releases, with a few additional small 
features based on requests or contributions.

The next major release will be 2.2 later this year, which is planned to 
include updates to the Heritrix 2 configuration system and checkpointing 
functionality, and tools easing transition from 1.14.1 to Heritrix 2.

Online release notes for 1.14.1 with a full list of issues addressed are 
available at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/Release+Notes+-+1.14.1

Online release notes for 2.0.1 with a full list of issues addressed are 
available at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix/2.0.1+Release+Notes

Project bug/issue tracking is in a JIRA-based system:

http://webteam.archive.org/jira/browse/HER

The project wiki is at:

http://webteam.archive.org/confluence/display/Heritrix

If you register to report/comment on JIRA issues, the same login will
work for wiki edits and comments.

- Gordon @ IA
